project.name: life-care
project.description: Build a website called “LifeCare” which will help to buy and sell the medicine including SOS type evaluations. Login with Email_Id and Password – will navigate to buyer’s dashboard or seller dashboard based on role mapped in DB. User signup – Name, Email, Password, select buyer or seller, govUID (Optional - to decide if “SOS card is eligible) Two screens based on role – buyer or seller? Seller will have option to select the pre-available medicine or add new medicines. Buyer’s screen will have all products(medicines) displayed with available quantity, SOS tag and price. Buyer’s will have payment screen for selected products, Following validate SOS Card with available account balance for user, also the SOS Card will be having set limit usage for single transactions and SOS card option will be only available for that user who have selected govUID at Signup.
